title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 934.1 - Purpose and Effect of Regulation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 934.1 - Purpose and Effect of Regulation

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of these regulations is to effectuate the statutory provisions of
sections 1-c(j) and 1-m of article 1-A of the Legislative Law. (b) The effect of these regulations is to
supersede prior advisory opinions issued by predecessor agencies to the Joint

Commission on Public Ethics to the extent they are inconsistent with this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
934.1

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 24, effective
6/18/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
